name: Douban FM
body:
# UbuntuTouch豆瓣FM

Ubuntu Touch 系统的豆瓣FM客户端。支持在线播放、离线音乐、微博分享。  
uApp Explorer 地址: [https://uappexplorer.com/app/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy](https://uappexplorer.com/app/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy)

### 截图
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dawndiy/douban-fm/master/screenshots/intr_300x600.png)

### 安装
#### 1. 使用安装包
下载: [安装包](https://github.com/dawndiy/douban-fm/releases/download/v0.1.2/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy_0.1.2_armhf.click)

用adb把安装包传到手机home目录里面:  `adb push <PACKAGE-FILE> /home/phablet/`  
运行 `adb push pkcon install-local --allow-untrusted <PACKAGE-FILE>`进行安装。

#### 2. Ubuntu Store

在手机中搜索**豆瓣FM**或**douban-fm**，包名为 **douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy** 的应用进行安装。

---

# Douban FM

Douban FM client on Ubuntu Touch. Support online play, off music, share to Sina Weibo.  
uApp Explorer: [https://uappexplorer.com/app/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy](https://uappexplorer.com/app/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy)

### Screenshots
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dawndiy/douban-fm/master/screenshots/intr_300x600.png)

### Installation
#### 1. Use click package
Download: [Click](https://github.com/dawndiy/douban-fm/releases/download/v0.1.2/douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy_0.1.2_armhf.click)

copy the .click file to phone's home folder via adb:  `adb push <PACKAGE-FILE> /home/phablet/`  
run `adb push pkcon install-local --allow-untrusted <PACKAGE-FILE>` to install.

#### 2. Ubuntu Store

Search **豆瓣FM** or **douban-fm** in Ubuntu Store on Ubuntu Phone, package name is **douban-fm.ubuntu-dawndiy**.
